Module imconfig
Package imconfig

Interface Configuration

  • public interface Configuration
    The main interface used to get configuration values and create derived configurations.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Configuration append​(Configuration otherConfiguration)
      Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with another one
      Configuration appendFromAnnotation​(AnnotatedConfiguration annotation)
      Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with the configuration from a AnnotatedConfiguration annotation
      Configuration appendFromAnnotation​(Class<?> configuredClass)
      Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with the configuration from a class annotated with AnnotatedConfiguration
      Configuration appendFromClasspathResource​(String resourcePath)
      Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with the configuration from one or several Java class resources resolved using the ClassLoader.getResources(String) method of the thread static class loader
      Configuration appendFromClasspathResource​(String resourcePath, ClassLoader classLoader)
      Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with the configuration from one or several Java class resources resolved using the ClassLoader.getResources(String) method of the specified class loader
      Configuration appendFromClasspathResourceOrURI​(String path)
      Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with the configuration from either a Java classpath resource (if the path starts with the pseudo-schema classpath:) or a regular URI resource
      Configuration appendFromEnvironment()
      Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with the configuration from the environment properties
      Configuration appendFromMap​(Map<String,​?> propertyMap)
      Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with the configuration from a Map object
      default Configuration appendFromPairs​(String... pairs)
      Create a new configuration resulting of merge the current configuration with the configuration from a set of directly passed strings, using each two entries as a pair of key,value.
      Configuration appendFromPath​(Path path)
      Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with the configuration from the resource of the specified path
      Configuration appendFromProperties​(Properties properties)
      Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with the configuration from a Properties object
      Configuration appendFromSystem()
      Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with the configuration from the System properties
      Configuration appendFromURI​(URI uri)
      Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with the configuration from the specified URI
      Configuration appendProperty​(String localRepository, String toString)
      Create a new configuration resulting of adding or replacing a property to the current configuration.
      Map<String,​String> asMap()  
      Properties asProperties()  
      Configuration filtered​(String keyPrefix)
      Creates a new configuration resulting of filtering the properties starting with the given prefix

      • withPrefix

        Configuration withPrefix​(String keyPrefix)
        Creates a new configuration resulting of adding the given prefix to every key

      • filtered

        Configuration filtered​(String keyPrefix)
        Creates a new configuration resulting of filtering the properties starting with the given prefix

      • inner

        Configuration inner​(String keyPrefix)
        Creates a new configuration resulting of filtering the properties starting with the given prefix, and the removing it

      • isEmpty

        boolean isEmpty()
        Returns:
        true if there is no properties in this configuration

      • hasProperty

        boolean hasProperty​(String key)
        Returns:
        true if there is a valued property with the given key

      • keys

        Iterable<String> keys()
        Returns:
        An iterable object over all the keys of the configuration, even for those which have no value

      • keyIterator

        Iterator<String> keyIterator()
        Returns:
        An iterator over all the keys of the configuration, even for those which have no value

      • keyStream

        Stream<String> keyStream()
        Returns:
        A stream from all the keys of the configuration, even for those which have no value

      • get

        <T> Optional<T> get​(String key,
                    Class<T> type)
        Returns:
        An optional value of the specified type, empty if the key does not exist

                                    Consumer<T> consumer)

      • getList

        <T> List<T> getList​(String key,
                    Class<T> type)
        Returns:
        A list with values of the specified type, empty if the key does not exist

      • getSet

        <T> Set<T> getSet​(String key,
                  Class<T> type)
        Returns:
        A set with values of the specified type, empty if the key does not exist

      • getStream

        <T> Stream<T> getStream​(String key,
                        Class<T> type)
        Returns:
        A stream with values of the specified type, empty if the key does not exist

      • asProperties

        Properties asProperties()
        Returns:
        The configuration represented as a Properties object

      • asMap

        Map<String,​String> asMap()
        Returns:
        The configuration represented as a Map object

        String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        A textual representation of the configuration

      • forEach

        void forEach​(BiConsumer<String,​String> consumer)
        Perform an action for each pair [key,value]

      • appendFromAnnotation

        Configuration appendFromAnnotation​(Class<?> configuredClass)
        Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with the configuration from a class annotated with AnnotatedConfiguration
        Parameters:
        configuredClass - Class annotated with AnnotatedConfiguration
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if the configuration was not loaded

      • appendFromAnnotation

        Configuration appendFromAnnotation​(AnnotatedConfiguration annotation)
        Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with the configuration from a AnnotatedConfiguration annotation
        Parameters:
        annotation -
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if the configuration was not loaded

      • appendFromEnvironment

        Configuration appendFromEnvironment()
        Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with the configuration from the environment properties

      • appendFromSystem

        Configuration appendFromSystem()
        Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with the configuration from the System properties

      • appendFromPath

        Configuration appendFromPath​(Path path)
        Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with the configuration from the resource of the specified path
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if the configuration was not loaded

      • appendFromURI

        Configuration appendFromURI​(URI uri)
        Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with the configuration from the specified URI
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException - if the configuration was not loaded

      • appendFromClasspathResourceOrURI

        Configuration appendFromClasspathResourceOrURI​(String path)
        Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with the configuration from either a Java classpath resource (if the path starts with the pseudo-schema classpath:) or a regular URI resource

      • appendFromProperties

        Configuration appendFromProperties​(Properties properties)
        Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with the configuration from a Properties object

      • appendFromMap

        Configuration appendFromMap​(Map<String,​?> propertyMap)
        Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with the configuration from a Map object

      • appendFromClasspathResource

        Configuration appendFromClasspathResource​(String resourcePath)
        Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with the configuration from one or several Java class resources resolved using the ClassLoader.getResources(String) method of the thread static class loader

      • appendFromClasspathResource

        Configuration appendFromClasspathResource​(String resourcePath,
                                          ClassLoader classLoader)
        Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with the configuration from one or several Java class resources resolved using the ClassLoader.getResources(String) method of the specified class loader

      • append

        Configuration append​(Configuration otherConfiguration)
        Create a new configuration resulting the merge the current configuration with another one

      • appendProperty

        Configuration appendProperty​(String localRepository,
                             String toString)
        Create a new configuration resulting of adding or replacing a property to the current configuration. Since this method creates a new object each time, it should not be used as the primary way to create large configurations but rather to tweak existing ones.

      • appendFromPairs

        default Configuration appendFromPairs​(String... pairs)
        Create a new configuration resulting of merge the current configuration with the configuration from a set of directly passed strings, using each two entries as a pair of key,value.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the number of strings is not even
